source_objects.description: Become a Social Media Maven with courses that can increase your social media presence: create a social media strategy, underderstand Facebook, Twitter and more.

items.title: LinkedIn for Business from Set-up to Analytics.

Learn how your network sees you in Search Results and how to change that!
Learn effective ways to build your network and increase your influence.

items.title: Keyword Research: Social Media Keyword Research Tools

objectives_summary: Understand Why Keyword Research Is Important for Social Media Marketing.
Why Is It Beneficial to Use Hashtags?
Have a Strategy for Going Forward with Social Media Keyword & Hashtag Research.

items.title: How To Use Pinterest To Promote Your eCommerce Store
